title: Upgrade claude-large from Opus 4.5 to Opus 4.6 on Bedrock
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Opus 4.6 enters the chat
gist.blurb: We've upgraded our `claude-large` model to the brand new Opus 4.6 via Bedrock. Smarter reasoning, same cozy vibes.
gist.summary: Updated the `claude-large` model configuration to utilize Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.6 on AWS Bedrock.
gist.impact: Users accessing the text API will automatically benefit from improved reasoning capabilities and model performance.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee in a cozy pixel art library, discovering a new, glowing magical book representing the smarter model. The book radiates soft light.
